annevk: do you think you'll be able to get to the select PRs soon?
content.formatted_body: annevk: do you think you'll be able to get to the select PRs soon?

content.body: Heads up WHATNOT attendees, as mentioned at https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/11170, I will cancel today's meeting. I am wondering what to do about next week's meeting, as most if not all regular Chromium attendees won't be attending, including facilitators like myself. Can I get any signals of who is planning to attend next Thursday's meeting (9am PDT) or if people would rather skip next week as well?
